title: Lovely view
text: The view from the top is breathtaking. It’s completely worth the journey to the top. Make sure you don’t pick a day with too much heat cause it can be hard!

title: Amazing vegan / gluten-free restaurant
text: Amazing vegan restaurant everything can be done also gluten free. The food is so tasting that we went there twice . The tsatsiki is to die for ... staff is very friendly and they offer outside tables

title: Amazing room
text: We just stayed for one night and this is the only thing we regret... special welcome treat at arrival ,amazing hotel, decorated with excellent taste very friendly staff, the room was amazing, 5 stars in all aspects

title: Delightful surprise
text: This restaurant had a very friendly atmosphere and the food was very good and tasty. Wide variety of meat dishes and pizzas! The plus is the fact that you can order in advance gluten free pizza and desserts and it’s absolutely fantastic! The owners are a very nice couple we are definitely going to come back

title: Nice staff nice meat
text:
Very good Brazilian restaurant nice atmosphere and the meat was very good
It’s inside the mall but it doesn’t feel like it

title: Excelent food not expensive
text: Good small restaurant the burgers are to die for and the chicken salad is amazing it comes with a sliced mango !! Good selection of beers and cider nice staff .

title: Best meat ever
text:
Lovely restaurant and the personnel are very friendly, sometimes even humorous.
Regarding the food, the portions are generous, delightfully seasoned and the meat quality is unrivaled.
I have had the pleasure of eating the best “Bife da Vazia” of my life @ Ti Lena, period!!!
place: Ti Lena Restaurante & Casa do Gin
placeLocation: Vila Nova de Santo Andre, Portugal
